data.text:
A few days have passed since I 
became Seiun Sky's trainer. However…
data.processed:
󠁿A few days have passed since I 
󠁿became Seiun Sky's trainer. However…

data.text:
Trainer-san, Trainer-san, have you heard! There's gonna be a 
nice tide coming in today! And you know what that means, right? 
This is the perfect day to go fishing!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Trainer-san, Trainer-san, have you heard! There's gonna be a 
󠁿nice tide coming in today! And you know what that means, right? 
󠁿This is the perfect day to go fishing!

data.text:
Are you seriously asking me about that? 
Hmm, well, I'll pass.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Are you seriously asking me about that? 
󠁿Hmm, well, I'll pass.

data.text:
Cause Sei-chan feels like working on her wrist snap rather than 
her footwork today. So how about we train tomorrow instead?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Cause Sei-chan feels like working on her wrist snap rather than 
󠁿her footwork today. So how about we train tomorrow instead?

data.text:
Wowie, we talked about "Cat Paradise: Nyancardia 
Project" for so long! We were so absorbed in our 
conversation that we both lost track of time.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Wowie, we talked about "Cat Paradise: Nyancardia 
󠁿Project" for so long! We were so absorbed in our 
󠁿conversation that we both lost track of time.

data.text:
Hmm? You seem like you want to say "but I wanted to discuss 
training…" Was it my imagination…? Yup, it must've been!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Hmm? You seem like you want to say "but I wanted to discuss 
󠁿training…" Was it my imagination…? Yup, it must've been!

data.text:
Eh? You came here looking for Sei-chan? Well that's really 
unfortunate… She just left a little while ago.
data.name: スカイのクラスメイト
data.processed:
󠁿Eh? You came here looking for Sei-chan? Well that's really 
󠁿unfortunate… She just left a little while ago.

data.text:
Despite being put in charge of Seiun Sky, 
I have yet to actually train with her.
data.processed:
󠁿Despite being put in charge of Seiun Sky, 
󠁿I have yet to actually train with her.

data.text: Does she have no drive to improve and win races…?
data.processed: 󠁿Does she have no drive to improve and win races…?

data.text:
If that's the case, why am I even here? 
I walked around the academy as I pondered this question.
data.processed:
󠁿If that's the case, why am I even here? 
󠁿I walked around the academy as I pondered this question.

data.text:
Hmph. So it seems that the rumors about a rookie 
trainer being manipulated were true.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
󠁿Hmph. So it seems that the rumors about a rookie 
󠁿trainer being manipulated were true.

data.text:
Remembering me in that manner is quite irritating, so make sure 
to correct it! I am King Halo, the elite Uma Musume. I shall 
also grant you the right to address me with "sama!"
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
󠁿Remembering me in that manner is quite irritating, so make sure 
󠁿to correct it! I am King Halo, the elite Uma Musume. I shall 
󠁿also grant you the right to address me with "sama!"

data.text:
Anyways… Haa… From the looks of it, 
it really does seem like she's manipulating you.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
󠁿Anyways… Haa… From the looks of it, 
󠁿it really does seem like she's manipulating you.

data.text:
I was hoping to get some valuable information on Sky-san from 
you to develop a strategy, but… this was a complete waste! As 
it stands, it'll happen all over again… Ah, jeez!
data.name: King Halo

choices.text: Is Seiun Sky really that fast?
Is Seiun Sky really that fast?

data.processed:
󠁿I was hoping to get some valuable information on Sky-san from 
󠁿you to develop a strategy, but… this was a complete waste! As 
󠁿it stands, it'll happen all over again… Ah, jeez!

data.text: Haa!? When it comes to speed, she's…
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: 󠁿Haa!? When it comes to speed, she's…

data.text:
Hmph…! 
Instead of asking me about these things, 
why not see for yourself!?
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
󠁿Hmph…! 
󠁿Instead of asking me about these things, 
󠁿why not see for yourself!?

data.text:
The next day, I asked if I could sit in on 
Seiun Sky's class. And what I saw was…
data.processed:
󠁿The next day, I asked if I could sit in on 
󠁿Seiun Sky's class. And what I saw was…

data.text: So the mock race is finally here, huh?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿So the mock race is finally here, huh?

data.text:
Don't talk about this race in that manner! After 
all, today will be the day that you finally 
realize just how great I am! Ohohoho!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
󠁿Don't talk about this race in that manner! After 
󠁿all, today will be the day that you finally 
󠁿realize just how great I am! Ohohoho!

data.text:
But I already know how great you are though? You really 
are an elite Uma Musume. King, you're really amazing.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿But I already know how great you are though? You really 
󠁿are an elite Uma Musume. King, you're really amazing.

data.text: It doesn't feel like you mean what you're saying!!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: 󠁿It doesn't feel like you mean what you're saying!!

data.text:
Hmph, today will be the last day that you take 
that attitude with me! Because today… Today I 
will thoroughly mark you, and defeat you!!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
󠁿Hmph, today will be the last day that you take 
󠁿that attitude with me! Because today… Today I 
󠁿will thoroughly mark you, and defeat you!!

data.text:
Thoroughly mark me, huh? 
Oh no… How scary.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Thoroughly mark me, huh? 
󠁿Oh no… How scary.

data.text:
Sei-chan and King-chan are getting fired up… 
But I'm not planning on losing either…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Sei-chan and King-chan are getting fired up… 
󠁿But I'm not planning on losing either…!

data.text:
Eh, I wonder if Sky-san is someone we should be wary of… 
Have you heard any rumors about her that have stood out?
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed:
󠁿Eh, I wonder if Sky-san is someone we should be wary of… 
󠁿Have you heard any rumors about her that have stood out?

data.text:
Rumors that stood out? Well I've been hearing a pretty bad 
one lately. Apparently, she skips out on training everyday.
data.name: Horsegirl B
data.processed:
󠁿Rumors that stood out? Well I've been hearing a pretty bad 
󠁿one lately. Apparently, she skips out on training everyday.

data.text: (Thunk!!)
data.processed: 󠁿(Thunk!!)

data.text:
Thus the mock race began. 
The first one to take the lead was…
data.processed:
󠁿Thus the mock race began. 
󠁿The first one to take the lead was…

data.text: Haa… Haa… Eh!?
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: 󠁿Haa… Haa… Eh!?

data.text:
Huh? King-san is in the lead!? Wasn't Sky-san a "front runner" 
type that takes the lead as quickly as possible…?
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed:
󠁿Huh? King-san is in the lead!? Wasn't Sky-san a "front runner" 
󠁿type that takes the lead as quickly as possible…?

data.text:
Maybe she's lost a lot of her physical strength and can't make 
it to the front of the pack since she's been skipping out on 
training… or something? I've heard that that happens a lot.
data.name: Horsegirl B
data.processed:
󠁿Maybe she's lost a lot of her physical strength and can't make 
󠁿it to the front of the pack since she's been skipping out on 
󠁿training… or something? I've heard that that happens a lot.

data.text: Haa… Haa… Ugh, my legs…!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿Haa… Haa… Ugh, my legs…!

data.text:
Hmph, I heard that you've been slacking off lately, but I didn't 
realize just how far gone you truly were! I was an idiot for 
being overly cautious of you.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
󠁿Hmph, I heard that you've been slacking off lately, but I didn't 
󠁿realize just how far gone you truly were! I was an idiot for 
󠁿being overly cautious of you.

data.text:
This will be fine. I did not expect it, but adapting to these 
types of situations is what makes me an elite Uma Musume As 
long as I continue to extend this lead…!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
󠁿This will be fine. I did not expect it, but adapting to these 
󠁿types of situations is what makes me an elite Uma Musume As 
󠁿long as I continue to extend this lead…!

data.text:
Due to Seiun Sky's late start, King Halo gave 
up on her mark and took a huge lead instead. 
The race continued in this manner until…
data.processed:
󠁿Due to Seiun Sky's late start, King Halo gave 
󠁿up on her mark and took a huge lead instead. 
󠁿The race continued in this manner until…

data.text:
During the final stretch, King Halo's 
pace started to gradually decline…!
data.processed:
󠁿During the final stretch, King Halo's 
󠁿pace started to gradually decline…!

data.text: Nghh…! My stamina is…!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: 󠁿Nghh…! My stamina is…!

data.text:
To be fair, you're better as a "stalker", King. It would've been 
a real problem had you stayed behind me, marked me, and overtook 
me in the final stretch.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿To be fair, you're better as a "stalker", King. It would've been 
󠁿a real problem had you stayed behind me, marked me, and overtook 
󠁿me in the final stretch.

data.text: But this was exactly the opening I was waiting for…!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿But this was exactly the opening I was waiting for…!

data.text: Wai- Huh!? Sky-san!?
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: 󠁿Wai- Huh!? Sky-san!?

data.text:
Eh, Sky-san took the lead!? 
You're joking! When did that even happen!?
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed:
󠁿Eh, Sky-san took the lead!? 
󠁿You're joking! When did that even happen!?

data.text:
But she seemed like she was rusty from lack of training… Wait, 
don't tell me… Was this her plan all along!?
data.name: Horsegirl B
data.processed:
󠁿But she seemed like she was rusty from lack of training… Wait, 
󠁿don't tell me… Was this her plan all along!?

data.text: Great, they fell for it! Now all I need to do is…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿Great, they fell for it! Now all I need to do is…

data.text: This… This match isn't over yet!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿This… This match isn't over yet!!

data.text: Haaaa!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Haaaa!!

data.text: Huh…!?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿Huh…!?

data.text:
Special Week ended up coming in 1st, 
with Seiun Sky a very close 2nd.
data.processed:
󠁿Special Week ended up coming in 1st, 
󠁿with Seiun Sky a very close 2nd.

data.text:
She closed in on me and dropped me to 2nd, huh? Spe-chan's 
explosive power is really something…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿She closed in on me and dropped me to 2nd, huh? Spe-chan's 
󠁿explosive power is really something…

choices.text: You did great out there too
You did great out there too

data.text: But I came in 2nd.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿But I came in 2nd.

data.text:
My tricks, my preparations, 
they weren't enough to get me the win.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿My tricks, my preparations, 
󠁿they weren't enough to get me the win.

data.text:
Wait wha!? Trainer-san!? You were here? Since when? You can't 
just do that, if you're here you've gotta properly tell me!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Wait wha!? Trainer-san!? You were here? Since when? You can't 
󠁿just do that, if you're here you've gotta properly tell me!

data.text:
Don't tell me. Since we haven't been seeing each 
other at training, have you gotten lonely? Ahh, 
being this popular's really tough!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Don't tell me. Since we haven't been seeing each 
󠁿other at training, have you gotten lonely? Ahh, 
󠁿being this popular's really tough!

data.text:
But you'll have to wait on getting an autograph. 
I'm exhausted, so I'm going to take a nap. Toodaloo.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿But you'll have to wait on getting an autograph. 
󠁿I'm exhausted, so I'm going to take a nap. Toodaloo.

data.text: After saying that, Seiun Sky quickly left the track…
data.processed: 󠁿After saying that, Seiun Sky quickly left the track…
